# Welcome on Issy's Space Station (ISS)
## Server Type This server is a Light Roleplay (LRP) environment.
## Conduct All players must behave respectfully toward each other at all times.
### No Discrimination Discrimination against real or real-life-related persons is strictly prohibited. - Racism - Sexism - Hate speech - Insults - Mobbing - Unnecessary trolling
## Roleplay - **In Character:** Stay in character at all times during roleplay. - **Out Of Character:** If you need to communicate out of character, use OOC.
## Violence Killing or similar hostile actions are only allowed if you have an appropriate antagonist role.
## Support For questions about the server or applications, please visit our Discord server.
